article: Helen is a middle student.She lives far from  _  school,so she usually takes the bus to school.She  _  to school at about six thirty  _  the morning.She  _  want to be late. The first class  _  at eight o'clock.There are four classes in the morning and two in the afternoon.She doesn't go home  _  lunch.She has it at school. Helen learns Chinese,math,biology,PE and some other  _  .She works very hard,and she  likes  math very much  _  she thinks it's very interesting. In the evening,Helen usually does her homework and sometimes she watches TV.She goes to  _  at ten o'clock.
